README.md: # MC Quantifying Morphological Computation ### Evaluating Morphological Computation in Muscle and DC-motor Driven Models of Human Hopping, by Keyan Ghazi-Zahedi, Daniel F.B. Haeufle, Guido Montufar, Syn Schmitt, and Nihat Ay [Arxiv 1512.00250](http://arxiv.org/abs/1512.00250) The files and data used in that publication can be found in the directory matlab. Running the script analyse_hopping_data will produce the results found in the publication. A C++ implementation can be found at [https://github.com/kzahedi/entropy.](https://github.com/kzahedi/entropy)
